channel.description: Recent content in checkin on blag

item.title: Recurse Center Day 3: Hammock Driven Development
item.description: This is a draft post that I have prematurely published. Currently, I am attending RC and I want to write as much as possible, log my daily learnings and activities. But, I also don't want to spend time on grammar and prose, so I am publishing all the posts which usually I'd have kept in my draft folder. Pairing Workshop I attended the pairing workshop today, it was fun! First, there was a talk that introduced us to the concept of pair programming.

B Tree I started working on the B Tree project, created a Github repo, put up skeleton code.

item.title: Recurse Center Day 1: init
item.description: This is a draft post that I have prematurely published. Currently, I am attending RC and I want to write as much as possible, log my daily learnings and activities. But, I also don't want to spend time on grammar and prose, so I am publishing all the posts which usually I'd have kept in my draft folder. My RC first day was filled with welcome events and fun activities.
